description.value:
Creates a compliant state within a person, or calms them down. Imposes -20 to Willpower Tests for 1d10 hours. Commonly given to Penal Legionnaires, with the right dosage individuals can be made almost unawarely enthuastic for their likely brutal deaths.

Effect: Common

Notes: 100 T
